inclusion.criterion: Clinically diagnosed with mild to moderate BPH (AUA symptom score <20)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with severe BPH (AUA symptom score >21)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Currently using any other forms of medical therapy, prescription finasteride,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: terazosin, tamsulosin or propecia (for hair loss).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior Transurethral resection of the prostate (TURP).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Using non-prescription supplements such as Saw Palmetto, B-sitosterol, vitamin E,
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 55 year old man with lower urinary tract symptoms. He has an IPSS score of 15 and prostate volume of 60 mL.
